title: Assessment of chocolate retail in Ghana and willingness to use cooling devices

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Vincent Abe-Inge, James Arabe, Jacob K. Agbenorhevi, Ibok N. Oduro, Latifatu Mohammed, John-Lewis Z. Zaukuu, Frank A. Asante, Genevieve Pawar, Nana Ofori Owusu
